## FI equations  

<!-- This is the general form of FI (@fisher1922): -->
<!-- \begin{equation}  -->
<!--     I(\theta) = \int \frac{dy}{p(y|\theta)}\left[\frac{dp(y|\theta)}{d\theta}\right]^2 \\ -->
<!--   (\#eq:fisher1922) -->
<!-- \end{equation}  -->

<!-- This is the adapted form of FI for system states $s$ (@mayer2007): -->
